title: mangaLa sarvamu
sahitya:
mangaLa sarvamu lIvammA madhura bhASiNI nIkidi bhAramA


anupallavi

  tunga gajEndruni duritamu dIrcina pankaja nayanI pAlimpa rAvammA
				(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
paradEvI sannidhilO satatamu sEvita rAjamaNi gamaka nayanI pAlimpa rAvammA


caraNam    antaka ripuDu agnI shuDutO centanE nelakonna dantapura rANi
intaTa nIvu nA vinnapamuvini sundara dAsuniki varamulosagi
